name: Roll of the dice and unfortunately death
name_original: Roll of the dice and unfortunately death
description:
Dices guide

1st dice shows player speed:

 1 = 200

 2 = 300

 4 =500

 5 = 700

 6 = 1000

2nd dice shows timers time in minutes:

  1 = 1 min

  2 = 2 min

  3 = 3 min

  4 = 4 min

  5 = 5 min

  6 = 6 min

3rd dice shows timers time in seconds:

  1 = 10 sec

  2 = 20 sec

  3 = 30 sec

  4 = 40 sec

  5 = 50 sec   6 = 60 sec

Description

Even I can't quite tell what this game is about. All I know is that it's a platformer where the dice decide your fate. The dice sets the speed, time in minutes and seconds. Levels are also randomized. This is my first fully finished game. I thought about doing Dice Chess but it didn't work out...So yeah
